ratings.comment: Rick is your saving grace if you take An Sci 434; he is extremely knowledgeable about reproductive physiology. His passion is contagious, and he is always willing to help students out and answer questions. He was our lab instructor, and I have nothing but great things to say about Rick. This class is a lot of work, and Rick helps us all through!

This course is the best money I have ever spent.  My previous interest in reproduction was enhanced by an order of magnitude.  Mr. Monson's instructional techniques are based on amazing career experiences and in depth knowledge. He is passionate and charismatic about this field and teaching.  You want him as a part of your network-super connected.

Repro is a challenging course that will push you, but at the end it is very rewarding and is still one of my favorites. Rick is an amazing professor and is very willing to help you any way that he can. If you are looking for an animal science advisor he is one of the best!

434 is a difficult course with a difficult professor. This three credit course is demanding and challenging, but Rick's enthusiasm and passion for teaching make it bearable. He is willing to help any student if they are willing to ask and put in the work. Because of Rick, I now have an interest in reproduction. He is a great educator.

The material in this class will push you, but Rick will get you there if you're willing to work. It's not an easy class by any means and you have to work. His passionate character pulls kids along who want to get there. I thank him for pushing, engaging, inspiring me. He's a professor that genuinely cares about his students. He's the best.

Rick Monson is absolutely wonderful to have as a teacher. His caring nature gave me the ultimate confidence in my knowledge of material. He challenged us w/ questions to ensure the understanding of material far surpassed the scope of class. Rick went out of his way for all of his students and I thank him for inspiring me to pursue a job in repro.

Mr. Monson is acutely aware of how to communicate with students.  He understands various learning styles and abilities and will speak to you on an appropriate level.  This dude really knows reproduction and is great at helping people find jobs.  Perhaps the most exceptional person I've encountered at UW-Madison.  Thank you so much Rick!

Mr. Monson is the textbook definition of a dignified confident instructor.  His charm and charisma is matched only by his passion and dedication to his profession.  He has the ability to reduce very complicated biological processes and techniques to a logical and rational progression.  Best instructor I have had at UW, take it if you can handle it.

Rick is by far the best instructor and teacher that I have had throughout my college career.  The course material is tough but Rick does everything he can in order to make it more clear and easier to remember.  I learned more in this class than any other class that I have taken.  I would recommend this course and Rick to anyone and everyone!!!
Rick is amazing. He is willing to go above and beyond to help his students.
one of the best teachers i have ever had.
Prof. has his class pets students. Good course overall.

Imagine someone who loves teaching, cares more about his students than himself and is an expert in the subject matter.  Tough course, excellent instructor.  I learned more in this course than any other I've taken here and its mostly because of Rick.  Nice guy and BTW cute as well.
Awesome instructor!  Takes serious and difficult subject matter and makes it very interesting and fun.  You will want to take another class with him.  Nice to look at too!

He is an amazing professor who can talk to you about nearly anything. He was a breath of fresh air from the other professor in this class who took a really difficult class and made it way to serious. I am not going to lie this is a difficult class but if you are taking it with someone let it be Rick.

Enjoyed the class a lot but don't take if you're lazy. Missing class is not an option. Professor is super helpful and is an efficient teacher but the class teaches a complex topic that may be hard for someone without an an sci background.
He is very interested and willing to teach about this topic.  He is helpful in finding outside sources to persue research in the field of animal reproduction.
